trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for reading, writing, and deleting session cookies on an HTTP client.
Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler"></xref> class.
Deletes the cookie associated with the current request that has the default name, domain, and path.

The name, domain and path are specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Name%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Domain%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Path%2A> properties.
The request is specified by <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
Deletes the cookie associated with the current request that has the specified name and the default domain and path.
The domain and path are specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Domain%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Path%2A> properties.
The request is specified by <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
The name of the cookie.
name is or empty.
Deletes the cookie associated with the current request that has the default name, domain, and path.

The name, domain and path are specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Name%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Domain%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Path%2A> properties.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the request.
Deletes the cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name and the default domain and path.
The domain and path are specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Domain%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Path%2A> properties.
The name of the cookie.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the request.
name is or empty.
Deletes the cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, path, and domain.
The name of the cookie.
The path for the cookie.
The domain for the cookie
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the request
name is or empty.
When overridden in a derived class, deletes the cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, domain, and path.
Called from the overloaded <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Delete%2A> methods to do the actual work of deleting the cookie.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Delete%2A> methods will ensure that name and path are non-empty strings.
The name of the cookie
The path for the cookie
The domain for the cookie
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the request.
Gets or sets the domain used for cookies.
The domain used for cookies.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cookie should be hidden from client script.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should be hidden from client script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
If the target domain is within the cookie domain and the target path is within the cookie path, match the casing of the cookie path portion.
The base URL of the request.
The URL to match
Returns <xref:System.String>.
Gets or sets the base name for cookies written by the handler.
The base name to use for cookies.
The default is “FedAuth”.
An attempt to set a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or empty value occurs.
Gets or sets the virtual path for cookies written by the handler.
The virtual path.
Defaults to the root of the ASP.NET application.
An attempt to set a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or empty value occurs.
The lifetime of persistent sessions.
If zero, transient sessions are always used.
The session lifetime.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A value that is less than zero is specified.
Reads the cookie associated with the current request that has the default name.
The name of the cookie is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Name%2A> property.
The request is specified by <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The cookie value or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cookie was not found.
Reads the cookie associated with the current request that has the specified name.
The request is specified by <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
The name of the cookie to read.
The cookie value or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cookie was not found.
name is or empty.
Reads the cookie associated with the current request that has the default name, domain, and path.
The name of the cookie is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Name%2A> property.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the request.
The cookie value or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cookie was not found.
Reads the cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name and the default domain and path.
The name of the cookie to read.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the request.
The cookie value or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cookie was not found.
name is or empty.
When overridden in a derived class, reads the cookie that has the specified name and that is associated with the specified request.
Called from the overloaded <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Read%2A> methods to do the actual work of reading the cookie.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Read%2A> methods will ensure that `name` is a non-empty string.
The name of the cookie
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the request.
The cookie value or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cookie was not found
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the cookie should be used only with SSL.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Writes a cookie associated with the current request that has the specified value, persistence, and expiration time.
If the `isPersistent` parameter is `false`, the cookie expiration time is set to <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>.

If the `isPersistent` parameter is `true`, the cookie expiration time is set to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.PersistentSessionLifetime%2A> property if it is not `null` or, if the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.PersistentSessionLifetime%2A> property is `null`, the expiration time is set to the value of the `tokenExpirationTime` parameter.

The cookie name, domain and path are specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Name%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Domain%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Path%2A> properties.
The request is specified by <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A>.

Whether the cookie should be sent only over SSL is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.RequireSsl%2A> property and whether the cookie should be hidden from client-side scripts is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.HideFromClientScript%2A> property.
The cookie value.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie is persistent; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cookie is session-only, that is, only valid until the browser on the client is closed.
The expiration time for the underlying token.
value is or empty.
Writes a cookie associated with the current request that has the specified name, value, and expiration time.
The cookie domain and path are specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Domain%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Path%2A> properties.
The request is specified by <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The request is specified by <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A>.

Whether the cookie should be sent only over SSL is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.RequireSsl%2A> property and whether the cookie should be hidden from client-side scripts is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.HideFromClientScript%2A> property.
The cookie value.
The name of the cookie.
The expiration time for the cookie, or <xref:System.DateTime> for a session (session-only) cookie.
value is or empty.
name is or empty.
Writes a cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, value, and expiration time.
The cookie domain and path are specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Domain%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Path%2A> properties.
The request is specified by <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A>.

Whether the cookie should be sent only over SSL is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.RequireSsl%2A> property and whether the cookie should be hidden from client-side scripts is specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.HideFromClientScript%2A> property.
The cookie value.
The name of the cookie.
The expiration time for the cookie, or <xref:System.DateTime> for a session (session-only) cookie.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the request.
value is or empty.
name is or empty.
Writes a cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, value, domain, path, expiration time, and visibility.
The cookie value.
The name of the cookie.
The path for the cookie
The domain for the cookie
The expiration time for the cookie, or <xref:System.DateTime> for a session (session-only) cookie.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should be hidden from client script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the request.
value is or empty.
name is or empty.
When overridden in a derived class, writes a cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, value, domain, path, expiration time, persistence and visibility.
Called from the overloaded <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Write%2A> methods to do the actual work of writing the cookie.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler.Write%2A> methods will ensure that `value` is a non-empty byte array and that `name` and `path` are non-empty strings.
The cookie value.
The name of the cookie.
The path for the cookie
The domain for the cookie
The expiration time for the cookie, or <xref:System.DateTime> for a session (session-only) cookie.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should be hidden from client script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the request.
